mapper.select:
SELECT t.* FROM OA_BPM_CONF t WHERE 1=1
AND t.id=#{param.id}
SELECT count(*) FROM OA_BPM_CONF t WHERE 1=1
mapper.insert: insert into OA_BPM_CONF (id, `code`, `key`,pname,dname, users, pid) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{users,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM OA_BPM_CONF WHERE 1=1 AND id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE OA_BPM_CONF SET code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `key` = #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pname = #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dname = #{dname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, users = #{users,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE id=#{id}
